channel.title: Cointelegraph.com News
channel.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

image.title: Cointelegraph.com News
image.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

item.title: Nike teases upcoming ‘Airphoria’ NFT sneaker hunt on Fortnite
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brian Quarmby
item.description: In a short promotional video, Nike’s logo for its web3 platform .SWOOSH features alongside the logos for Epic Games’ Unreal Engine and Fortnite game.

item.title: On-chain sleuth ZachXBT sued for libel after claiming plaintiff drained funds from project
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Blackstone
item.description: Plaintiff Jeffrey Huang claims his reputation was damaged when ZachXBT allegedly falsely accused him of embezzlement.

item.title: Ethereum network upgrade and uptick in Arbitrum active users could trigger an ARB price reversal
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Nivesh Rustgi
item.description: Positive Ethereum and Arbitrum network developments and the eventual improvement in crypto investor sentiment could lend a boost to the ARB price.

item.title: ‘We had to change strategies,' says SEC enforcement director on recent actions: Report
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: The SEC has taken enforcement actions against several crypto firms, a move that has been criticized by many U.S. lawmakers and industry leaders.

item.title: Curve pool imbalance triggers USDT depeg concerns: Finance Redefined
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Prashant Jha
item.description: The top 100 DeFi tokens had another bearish week, with the majority of tokens trading in the red.

item.title: Think AI tools aren't harvesting your data? Guess again
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Erik Prince & Ryan Paterson
item.description: When you use a “free” product like ChatGPT, your personal data is the product — and governments across the globe are using that to their advantage.

item.title: 3 key Ether price metrics point to growing resistance at the $1,750 level
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Marcel Pechman
item.description: Ether's price looks poised for additional downside as low as the $1,560 level.

item.title: Meta’s new ‘Voicebox’ AI is a text-to-speech tool that learns like ChatGPT
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tristan Greene
item.description: Meta claims Voicebox is the first AI that can generalize text-to-speech tasks it wasn’t trained to accomplish and describes it as a “breakthrough.”

item.title: Crypto Biz: Crypto outflows surge, a16z’s UK office, and the silent altcoins ban
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Paula Pereira
item.description: A tight regulatory environment in the United States coupled with soaring interest rates is forcing crypto companies to rethink their business strategies.

item.title: Price analysis 6/16: BTC, ETH, BNB, XRP, ADA, DOGE, SOL, MATIC, LTC, DOT
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Rakesh Upadhyay
item.description: Bitcoin has reclaimed the $26,000 level, but will large cap altcoins follow BTC's rebound?

item.title: Which altcoins will survive the SEC crackdown? Bitcoin OG explains
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Marco Castrovilli
item.description: Bitcoin OG and educator Dan Held points out which crypto assets are most likely to avoid the ongoing SEC crackdown.

item.title: Bitcoin price eyes $26K ‘acceleration’ zone as Binance fears fade
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: An ongoing recovery from U.S. macroeconomic policy updates could spell more sustained progress for the BTC price going into the holiday weekend.

item.title: Mango Markets exploiter behind alleged $116M theft will stand trial in December
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: Avraham Eisenberg faces civil lawsuits from the U.S. Commodity Futures Trading Commission, Securities and Exchange Commission and Mango Markets and criminal charges from the DOJ.

item.title: Bakkt follows Robinhood, eToro in delisting major altcoins: Report
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Paula Pereira
item.description: Bakkt reportedly suspended trading of SOL, MATIC and ADA — tokens the U.S. SEC recently deemed securities.

item.title: Self-custody Bitcoin amount unmeasurable so far, says Santiment exec
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Helen Partz
item.description: One of the most notable results of self-custody is that it tends to decrease circulation, which in turn reduces the market cap.

item.title: dApp Store Kit adopts new tech stack to power Web3 gaming development
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Gareth Jenkinson
item.description: Ready Games’ software development kit is touted to help improve Web3 gaming accessibility and user experience.

item.title: USDT issuer Tether responds to Chinese securities exposure reports
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ezra Reguerra
item.description: USDT issuer Tether said that they “do not condone” the behavior of the media outlets and highlighted that the materials presented do not reflect what Tether is at present.

item.title: The Hinman docs: Implications for XRP, SEC credibility and more
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Luke Huigsloot
item.description: The Hinman documents have been available to Ripple for over two years, and their public release has been eagerly awaited by many, but some were disappointed by the lack of any real bombshells.

item.title: Binance under investigation in France since February 2022: Report
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Prashant Jha
item.description: The French arm of Binance is reportedly under investigation by the local authorities on charges of “aggravated money laundering.“

item.title: 7 alternatives to ChatGPT
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Alice Ivey
item.description: ChatGPT alternatives offer unique features and functionalities, expanding the possibilities of interactive AI-driven interaction.

item.title: Trezor CEO cites usability as top factor for hardware wallet: BTC Prague 2023
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Helen Partz
item.description: Trezor doesn’t plan to introduce any private key recovery tools, as it has provided all possible means to help users secure the seed phrase, CEO Matej Zak said.

item.title: Bitcoin price eases downside as traders demand $24.5K support holds
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: While little changed, BTC price monitors hope that a “cascade” to $23,000 can be avoided.

item.title: Bitcoin in Cuba: Why some Cubans are adopting BTC to escape ‘The Matrix’
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Joe Hall
item.description: Private businesses in Cuba could be poised to benefit from the cryptocurrency revolution in one of the world’s harshest business environments.

item.title: SEC argues against Dentons’ motion to dismiss Terraform and Do Kwon’s lawsuit
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Amaka Nwaokocha
item.description: Lawyers for Terraform Labs and Do Kwon used a U.S. Congress hearing, Binance.US complaint and Hinman emails documents to dismiss the SEC lawsuit.

item.title: Binance is leaving the Dutch market: Here’s when
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Prashant Jha
item.description: Crypto exchange Binance announced its departure from the Netherlands, with users asked to withdraw their funds as soon as possible.

item.title: Sturdy stablecoin market reopens three days after $800K exploit
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ezra Reguerra
item.description: The DeFi protocol also offered the $100,000 bounty to anyone who could help bring an arrest or recover the funds.

item.title: Mark Cuban takes on SEC, John Reed Stark and ‘crypto derangement syndrome’
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Mitchelhill
item.description: The billionaire investor got stuck into a heated debate with former Securities and Exchange Commission official John Reed Stark over crypto regulation.

item.title: ‘Hey Mercedes’ — Mercedes-Benz trials ChatGPT-powered voice control
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brayden Lindrea
item.description: More than 900,000 Mercedes vehicles in the United States will have access to the new ChatGPT-enabled beta feature, which will be trialed for about three months.

item.title: Blockchain Assoc. requests info on Prometheum over ‘suspicious’ approval
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Jesse Coghlan
item.description: A FOIA request with the SEC regarding Prometheum has been filed, while others found former FINRA and SEC staffers among the firm's ranks.

item.title: BlackRock’s Bitcoin ETF ‘is the best thing to happen’ to BTC, or is it?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brayden Lindrea
item.description: Galaxy Digital CEO Mike Novogratz was among those over the moon with the news, others warn it could be the start of a major institutional takeover.
